turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey! I would like you to order me a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi! Okay! Which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The E. Main St. location in Richmond

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like an iced white chocolate mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Umm, let's do a venti. It's been a day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Haha understood. Whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, no definitely no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whole milk okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Woah now. I'm trying to watch my figure for summer!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just checking! What type of milk then?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any other special requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add a shot of espresso on there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright got it. And I'll have them add some chocolate shavings on top too like you like it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, you're the best.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I know! So that's a venti iced white chocolate mocha with almond milk, no whipped cream, an extra shot of espresso, and chocolate shavings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep that's it. My card and account should be on file.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is. Your drink will be ready shortly and a confirmation was sent to your email.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!
